title: Are you looking for teams or players? this is the place to be!
body:
We've seen a lot of players looking for teammates or duo's to play with, we wanted to provide a central place for that which is also easy to use.

Make sure to use the tags to make threads easy to navigate!

[LFT] - This tag can be used when you're looking for a team.

[LFP] - This tag can be used when you're looking for a duo queue partner

[LFM] - This tag can be used when you're looking for more to join your team.

Remember guys...

replies.body: Hi im wanna join, Looks pretty interesting im a b4 i will be silver soon! Hopefully u acept me, add me mrlazydude!
If u were to put LFT for looking for team it would make sense all cod players have done it and it would work better here

Hey man,

LFT seems to make more sense for **L**ooking **F**or **T**eam. Lets make that change!
Teamwork made SSW work... Just saying..
